names.bio: Jodi started out life as a native Philadelphian and later became a "native" New Yorker. With the unique combination of bawdy humor and a beautiful singing voice, this comedienne has played to packed houses and rave reviews in her shows, "Love is A Four Letter Word", "A Big Girl's Blouse", "My Balls on Your Tree" and her latest hit "Over the Edge". Jodi has been featured in the award winning "Hot Keys" and has won an ensemble award by the Off Broadway Revue for her role as Sheila Starr in "Dressing Room Divas, II". As a child actor, Jodi was introduced to the world as Marie in the classic film, "Rocky" a role she reprised as an adult in "Rocky V". Although she has numerous film and television credits, this brassy, busty blond is at home on the stage. Her gift is "creating outrageous characters in musical comedy".
names.name: Jodi Letizia
